title: Fabrication of injectable, adhesive, self-healing, superabsorbent hydrogels based on quaternary ammonium chitosan and oxidized pullulan
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Qian He, Xiaoyue Ding, Jun Deng, Yanze Zhang, Xiaoyi Wang, Dan Zhan, Oseweuba Valentine Okoro, Lizhao Yan, Armin Shavandi, Lei Nie
